title: Flamingals Women's Floral Embroidery Mid Waist High Stretch Bootcut Jeans with Pockets
description: Features: floral, mid waist, button detail, flare leg, versatile. The mid-waist design provides a comfortable fit, while the wide-leg style gives you a trendy and chic look. The pocket detail adds a touch of sophistication, making these jeans suitable for both casual and formal occasions

Material: Made of carefully selected super elastic denim fabric so that our customers will feel free in all positions when sitting or squatting. Soft lightweight and breathable fabrics can reduce the sense of restraint
Occasion: It is versatile to wear and suits most occasions such as casual, school, office, shopping, going out, party, vacation, and so on. It is suit for juniors, loved ones, and yourself

Size Chart: Small: Bust: 33-35", Waist: 27-28", Hips: 37-38", / Medium: Bust: 35-37", Waist: 29-30", Hips: 39-40", / Large: Bust: 37-39", Waist: 31-33", Hips: 41-43", / X-Large: Bust: 39-41", Waist: 34-36", Hips: 44-46", / XX-Large Plus: Bust: 41-43", Waist: 37-39", Hips: 47-49", / 3X-Large Plus: Bust: 43-45", Waist: 40-42", Hips: 50-52", / 4X-Large Plus: Bust: 45-47", Waist: 43-45", Hips: 53-55"

Friendly reminder, the size of this jean is small, if you want a looser effect, please order a larger size. Please refer to size measurement in the last item picture . As jeans fit experts, our sizing is based on a true-to-size fit. Since the fabric is super stretchy, we recommend you follow the exact size that fits you in the table
